original_text: They then went back. They went to En Mishpat. (That is Kadesh.) They took the whole land of the Amalekites. They also took the land of the Amorites who were living in Hazezon Tamar.
korean_text: 그들이 돌이켜 엔미스밧 곧 가데스에 이르러 아말렉 족속의 온 땅과 하사손다말에 사는 아모리 족속을 친지라

sentences.original_text: They took the whole land of the Amalekites.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아말렉 사람들의 모든 땅을 차지했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They also took the land of the Amorites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 아모리 사람들의 땅도 차지했습니다.

sentences.original_text: who were living in Hazezon Tamar.
